title: Rider
lyrics:
Oh, oh, oh, oh...
Here is the rider of the storm
The silence won't go and
A violence [?]
you know you'll miss me, you will miss me



When I'm gone

Oh, oh, oh, oh...



Here is the promise I've been making

A fast sound I've been paying

I loved you, I'll leave you

You know you'll miss me, you will miss me



When I'm gone

When I'm gone

You will miss me, you will miss me

When I'm gone
